law.history: Repealed 1982Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, effective July 1, 1982. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Limited committee for mentally retarded person -- Functions -- Report.
metadata.note: .1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 150 would have repealed this section effective July 1, 1982. However, 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 396 was repealed by 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 146, also effective July 1, 1982.
